After entering his [[Jinchūriki Forms#Intial Jinchūriki Form|jinchūriki form]], [[Naruto]] is consumed in red chakra and throws a strong punch to the opponent's face. He then grabs their face, flips them around, and smacks the opponent into the ground. Ending it, Naruto gathers his chakra and runs toward the opponent to deliver a devastating uppercut.
[[es:Chakra Rojo]]
